name: com.stgame.exceltojsonclass
description:
Library for converting excel table into JSON and/or Unity class: https://github.com/nmtoan91

IsStringId     : Force id to string type (default=false)
IsGenItemClass : Skip generate item class; generate proto file instead (default=true)JSONName       : Json filename (default=toanstt)
defaultFloat   : Default value of float (default=0)
defaultInt     : Default value of int (default=0)
type:varname   : Force set variable type, with type = {int,float,string,bool,enumName}
IsGenEnum      : Is Generate all enums (default=false)
